scripts.start:moc-alpha-testnet: bash ./prepare_target.sh moc && export REACT_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version && env-cmd -f .env.mocTestnetAlpha react-scripts start
scripts.start:moc-testnet: bash ./prepare_target.sh moc && export REACT_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version && env-cmd -f .env.mocTestnet react-scripts start
scripts.start:moc-mainnet: bash ./prepare_target.sh moc && export REACT_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version && env-cmd -f .env.mocMainnet2 react-scripts start
scripts.build:moc-alpha-testnet: bash ./prepare_target.sh moc && export REACT_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version && export NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 && env-cmd -f .env.mocTestnetAlpha react-scripts build && rm build/projects/ -R
scripts.build:moc-testnet: bash ./prepare_target.sh moc && export REACT_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version && export NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 && env-cmd -f .env.mocTestnet react-scripts build && rm build/projects/ -R
scripts.build:moc-mainnet: bash ./prepare_target.sh moc && export REACT_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version && export NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 && env-cmd -f .env.mocMainnet2 react-scripts build && rm build/projects/ -R
